title: Game Progress Route
content:
o the Elfsong Tavern and proceed to the staircase leading to the tavern's second floor. Ascend the stairs and enter the door ahead. A cutscene will unfold, showing Devella at the crime scene. While she's frustrated someone let you through, she asks why you're interrupting her. Reply with:

Are you Devella? Valeria sent me to assist. I'm just a curious adventurer, interested in the scene. I'm no one important, just passing through. Your anger is quite palpable. I'll leave you be. I seem lost. I'l
